pageTitle: Lenovo Sport Messenger - Red | 0A33898 | Lenovo | (South Africa)
textBeforeTable: Enlarged pocket for smart phones Padded shoulder strap Lightweight design, only 1.46 lb/0.66 kg Fits most notebooks up to 15.6-inches wide Dual mesh bottle holders Workstation area Separate file compartment Padded laptop compartment “Sporty” design Sport Messenger for those who DO Carry your notebook PC, papers, books and other items in the newest Lenovo cases. These cases are designed for those who DO. Stylish combination of colours to support both black and colourful notebooks. These lightweight cases provide comfortable use and notebook protection as you travel to work or school.
